data.title: Trond Riiber Knudsen on LinkedIn: Truly inspiring to meet Gro Harlem Brundtland at the US Ambassador’s…
data.meta_description:
Truly inspiring to meet Gro Harlem Brundtland at the US Ambassador’s Residence here in Oslo today 

My fellow Harvard University alumni Gro Harlem Brundtland…
data.text:
As you can see- I just love my “job” 🌈🎉🙌 In this case - together with my all time favorite seed investor Raja Skogland - supporting an amazing networker and entrepreneur Niloufar Gharavi and her global partner from Founders Live the infamous Nick Hughes who visited us all the way from Seattle 👆🌎 We had a blast running a pitching competition at The Conduit in Oslo with some of the most amazing startups in Oslo - and a big hand to David Andrew Quist - chief scientist and chief explorer 😅 at Norwegian Mycelium (NoMy) for capturing the imagination of all of us with their vision of a cleaner and better fish farming industry in the future 🐠🐟🐬 Thanks to Dilek Ayhan and the whole team at The Conduit for hosting us - we’ll be back quickly 💯

With Laerdal Group -our ambition is to help save a million lives by 2030 - and we’re making it happen 🙏 Awesome to spend two days in beautiful Stavanger with the Board and the global leadership teams across Laerdal Medical , Laerdal Million Lives Fund , Laerdal Global Health, Laerdal Invest and RQI Partners, LLC Jeff Trost Becca Shmukler Karoline Myklebust Linde Gudleik Njå Brian Eigel, Ph.D. Morten Jacobsen Tor H. Bryne Ylva Lindberg Trude Stav Haye Impressed with the Laerdal family so deeply committed to positive social impact - helping saving lives and modernizing time-depended trauma care globally 🙌 Hanne Lærdal Ingrid Lærdal Jon Asmund Laerdal tore lærdal And big congratulations ( in the picture) 🗣️ to my friend Ken Morallee who turns 80 this year - and just accepted another 2 years on the Laerdal Medical Board - and 🗣️ to Alf-Christian Dybdahl - CEO of Laerdal Medical - who with his team delivered an all-time-high performance for Laerdal Medical in 2023 ✅ Thanks to Flor og Fjære for hosting us on their amazing “island-turned-botanical-garden” - sooo beautiful 🌈 https://lnkd.in/dQqFp3sg

Dear Peder Heggdal - Congratulations on your promotion to Director with PwC Norway 🎉🙌🎯 🗓️Back in March 2022 I met Peder Heggdal at an event at Eitri - The Healthcare Incubator at Haukeland universitetssjukehus in Bergen 👩🎓 Peder told of his scientific background in audiology and I said there was someone he should meet in Oslo - the revolutionary hearing team at person-Aiz AS 😁 Since then Peder and I have collaborated on a number of cases and projects across next generation hearing aids, digital health and ai symptom checking with Healthily in London, Energi.ai on climate accounting and with PWCs Slingshot program for scale ups Peder is a role model in so many ways - he is giving and giving without ever asking for anything in return - encompassing the “Pay Forward Culture” we need to succeed with building a strong ecosystem for entrepreneurship in Norway 🇳🇴 - a true role model - and miraculously it all pays back - no wonder you’re super successful 🎉 Big thanks from many of us who have benefited from your generosity 🙏 Henrik B. Pettersen Anders Boeen Claudia A. M. Bøen, Ph.D. Matteo Berlucchi

Next generation Norwegian tech entrepreneurs can be found at NTNU - Norges teknisk-naturvitenskapelige universitet (NTNU) 🙌 Great to see the support student entrepreneurs are getting from NTNU leadership, Innovasjon Norge with the START program, and the broader Trondheim ecosystem including my favorite newspaper - Adresseavisen 🙏 In the article I focus on a few points ment to inspire these young entrepreneurs to make the plunge into the startup world : 1 We’re all here to help - reach out - build networks and mentorship relationships 🫵 2 Dear to think big - what’s your dream - what if you succeed - how will the world benefit 🌎 3 Tech alone is not enough - balance your strong tech understanding with a passion for customers, market structure and competitive dynamics - how will you succeed in creating a scalable business 💯 4 A pledge from me - to always treat you with respect and dignity - to be supportive - and at the same time be blunt and direct - sometimes honest feedback is a gift 🎁 Looking forward to next year’s event Thanks for the coverage Stian Hansen and thanks for the partnership during the day Håvard Belbo and Stian K. Bongard 🙏 #NTNU #TrondheimTech #studententrepreneurship

Just completed another fantastic NTNU Student Investor Day at Norges teknisk-naturvitenskapelige universitet (NTNU) in beautiful Trondheim ☀️ It’s impressive to see how NTNUs Entreprenørskole with their 2-year master’s program is incubating so many high quality impact startups🎯 The investor day creates a nice “bridge” to mentorship and investments from the broader ecosystem- congrats again to Stian K. Bongard and team for another flawless day in the “Norwegian Capital of Tech” - including shuttling us into the celebration event “Tech, Hugs & Rock’n’Roll” that ran late into the evening with a number of important prizes : Arctic Protein won both prizes from the Investor Day pitching competition - both for best business idea and for best climate impact - they will change Norwegian Fishfarming over to sustained feeds made from insects 🐜 - congrats to my friends Torjus Ødegård ( in the picture) and Eirik Kristoffer Myking 🙌 SpareBank 1 SMN plays an important role in promoting the local ecosystem and generously handed out a number of talent prizes - congrats to : Sara Grette Ingrid Volden Smehagen Marte Stenvaag Nora Antonsen Theo Brissach Benjamin Bekken Daniel Faaravik Schiøtz Amazing to see the vibrancy of the tech ecosystem in Trondheim - lots of hope for the future - will be back next year 🙏

Big hug and thumbs up for Cornelia’s stellar high school graduation - we are so proud of you - you have a gift for finding interest in any academic subject - so inspiring for all of us 🙏🙌 Amazing to see the quality of teaching at Oslo Private Gymnasium OPG and the strong bonds created between students and teachers Hands up for the school under Sven Erik Rise’s leadership that has created a unique learning environment and thanks for installing a desire for lifelong learning with Cornelia 🙏🙌

Amazing Community Dinner at Katapult Future Fest 😄🎯 Perhaps the most exciting part of the Katapult Future Fest is the night where 650 international guests are invited home to a large number of Oslo-based community members - to connect with accomplished people from all over the the world - and in the process open the horizons and create new friendships Monica and I was lucky enough to host the most fantastic group of changemakers : - Roberta Benedetti del Rio who is inventing new ways to make global finance support system solutions to the climate crisis - Hon. Henry F. De Sio, Jr. who after serving in the Obama administration and a stint at Ashoka now serves as the COO for the UN Foundation - Rodrigo Villar - Founding partner at New Ventures Mexico - deeply committed to supporting social and environmental transformation in LatAm - Paarul Dudeja - dedicated to building equitable and sustainable supply chains through the Working Capital Fund - Louis Bickford - co-founder of Biografika and Memria as well as professor at Colombia Univeristy focusing on Human Rights and Transitional Justice - Marcus Hølland Eikeland - who were our first hire to Katapult back in 2017 - and now is a super impactful partner Katapult Future Fest takes part in Oslo the last week of May every year - and has emerged as a top-tier destination for the World’s most accomplished change makers - the people you meet never stops to amaze me - see you again next year 🙏🙌👍🎯
